semantic-imagecaption-desc: Extension de MediaWiki Semantic pro appoiar le generation de legendas de imagines a partir de annotationes.
semantic-imagecaption-rule-schema-descri: Iste typo de schema supporta le definition de regulas governante le recuperation e transformation de legendas de imagines e es fornite per le extension [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Image_Caption Semantic Image Caption].
